content.detailedDescription: I went outside to my backyard to throw away trash. i looked up and saw what i believed to be an airplane, as we live about 15 miles from the dallas/ft. worth airport.  i then saw the 2nd light traveling close behind. the objects were too close together in proximity to be airplanes, as i have observed many airplanes at this elevation (during busy times, we can see aiplanes approaching dfw every 2 or so minutes). the objects were moving south very quickly, and were much larger than airplane lights.  the lights were also  flickering as if on fire. after about a minute or so, they began to turn to the west.They disappeared behind the tree line of my backyard trees.  airplanes in this flight path that go over us always proceed due south.  i ran inside to get my husband, but when i returned, they were gone.  i thought they could have been meteors, but they were not descending at all. i don't know what i saw, but they were not airplanes, as i  see them on a regular basis. there was also an airplane taking off to the north at the same time that i saw these lights.
content.summary: 2 circular fireballs moving together, not descending.

content.detailedDescription: I went outside to my backyard to throw away trash. i looked up and saw what i believed to be an airplane, as we live about 15 miles from the dallas/ft. worth airport.  i then saw the 2nd light traveling close behind. the objects were too close together in proximity to be airplanes, as i have observed many airplanes at this elevation (during busy times, we can see aiplanes approaching dfw every 2 or so minutes). the objects were moving south very quickly, and were much larger than airplane lights.  the lights were also  flickering as if on fire. after about a minute or so, they began to turn to the west.They disappeared behind the tree line of my backyard trees.  airplanes in this flight path that go over us always proceed due south.  i ran inside to get my husband, but when i returned, they were gone.  i thought they could have been meteors, but they were not descending at all. i don't know what i saw, but they were not airplanes, as i  see them on a regular basis. there was also an airplane taking off to the north at the same time that i saw these lights.
content.summary: 2 circular fireballs moving together, not descending.

content.detailedDescription: It was 3.25am,i was having a cigarette out my bedroom window as i couldnt sleep,when i saw a bright light up in the sky,i can only describe it as a shooting star,but it was much bigger and moving quite slow,i watched it for a few seconds untill it just dissapeard,it was then i checked the time,it was 3.28am.
content.summary: Bright glowing ball

content.detailedDescription:
A coworker and i were driving south down hwy 65 in blaine. when we got to the on-ramp to main st/ county 14, we were at the light at the top of the bridge facing southeast. i was in the passenger seat.
	to my right in the southwest sky i then saw at approximately 10:01 pm, 4 red lights fly up from the horizon, then 3 more a second later following behind. it was brighter than anything else on that side of the horizon. they came up in a scattered sort of line, like a massive roman candle but a little quicker in pace of appearance. they moved slightly east and formed a pattern. one went higher up in the sky, a set of three formed a near equilateral triangle to the bottom right of the first,  and the last set of three formed a very wide obtuse scalene triangle to the immediate right of the first triangle. they were as bright as jupiter was during its peak this year, glowing red with just a little bit of yellow around them, but they were a significantly larger source than jupiter. they were a solid source of light, and they were moving visibly east and began to cross hwy 65. i watched them disappear behind the buildings as we turned and traveled north (my driver needed to get home), but when i got home a minute later i ran inside to get my boyfriend. i was very excited because it sounded a little similar to something somebody i know had seen once before a long time ago.
	when we went back outside all 7 were dimly visible from my parking lot due south and much smaller- the light source size was a third and they were just pricks of light, no longer glowing. to be seen from here they must have traveled over at least 1000 feet east and crossed over hwy 65 in approximately 3 minutes. the wide obtuse triangle vanished very quickly as soon as we got outside, as if it just blinked out. the high light and the equilateral triangle began to fade very rapidly and were gone in about a minute, almost as if they were traveling directly away from us. then i became suddenly frightened and went back inside.
	surface wind speeds in blaine this evening at 10 pm were calm to 4/mph w. wind speeds in blaine at 3000 ft were n nw 8/mph (national weather service)
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 7 red lights coming up from horizon, hovering, then moving east, then fading away

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
On the week of march 13, 1997, i was visiting my family in palm desert, california. on this particular night my sister and i were walking home (to my mom's) after spending most of the day with friends. at approx 8:00pm we were walking through the indian wells golf course which was kind of like a short cut for us at the time. there is a dried up wash that cuts right through the golf course and while we were crossing this wash we both looked straight up and thats when we both grabbed each others hand out of both excitement and fear and we both started asking each other, "...Do you see that? do you see that???". what we were both looking at was by far the biggest craft we have ever seen flying/hovering in mid air.  . we both then decided to lay down on our backs and watch it pass since it was directly over us. we layed down in the center of the wash that runs from west to east where we were located..Our heads were facing east as the craft appeared to be heading in that direction. what kept going through my mind while watching this was, "...How can something this huge fly that slow?" ... it was almost as if it were hovering yet we could both tell it was slowly moving east and directly over us.. the craft was almost a perfect triangular shape and was very dark and solid on the surface. it was not shiney or wavey or anything like that at all. infact, i just seen the videos about the arizona lights for the very first time about two months ago and shared it with my sister and we both agree that that was the same ship we seen.. only in the re-creations that the ofohunters made it was shiney and almost reflective looking. i'm going to have to disagree and say that it was more like several different sized rectangular and sqare "sections" or "panels" that were over lapping each other on some parts of the craft and some were protruding from it meaning there were several sections that were different heights then others so it wasn't a "perfectly flat" bottom like i seen in those videos. 
again, the thing that kept going through my mind was how can something as big as this be flying so slowly over us the way it is. i was trying to take in as much as possible but it was just too big. i remember looking to my left and then to my right while laying down there to see if i  could locate the ends of this triangle and was just shocked at how long the span of this was. 
then i seen two lights (one on each end of what would be considered to be the back) that were more like soft, but very large orbs light up, then two more that were closer together then the other two lit up then finally another large orb lit up in the front and then suddenly it shot off like a rocket straight up and to the north without a sound....
my sister and i were freaked out and couldn't wrap our minds around what it was we just seen. we immediately ran to our parent's home and told them what happened and we all went outside and couldn't find any trace of anything. 
this sighting lasted for nearly 10 seconds. i'd say between 8-10 seconds max. 
we haven't met anyone else yet who may have also seen this large craft in that area. but according to arizona and nevada there were multiple sightings of this same craft so maybe there is a pattern of some kind? thanks for reading and allowing me to share this exerience here. 
peace and bright blessings~
content.summary: My trangular craft experience .. march 13, 1997 southern california

content.detailedDescription: My boyfriend woke me up and said come outside now theres ufos in the sky hurry. i woke up thinking he was crazy but i would look to please him and not make him feel stupid he was scared. i went outside ..We live in a busy neightborhood in a simi big city. i looked south and didnt see anything. i started to go inside he said stop look look there they are. i went back to the end of our yard into the street.And up from the horizon came 6-7 red 'fire balls" i started yelling oh my god oh my god..What is it..I thought we were under attack maybe missles..Then i thought space was exploading sending astroids or fire balls towards us..They were moving slowly like dripping upward..But had no tail..They moved slowly but withing 60 seconds as they went up toward the middle of the sky they disinigrated..I was so scared and still am. i called my family and woke them up and told them to look south outside.I was crying . then we saw 2 small airplanes or jets flying across where they were..Then we saw a bright green one through the trees..It never acended.
content.summary: 10-12 red cirlce "fire balls" coming up from the horizon..Disinicrated as they went up

content.detailedDescription: I was standing outside a bicycle shop waiting for my bicycle to be tuned up. i like to look up into the sky from time to time, hoping to capture anything unusual with my digital camera. it was a very hot day (90'f), cloudless, blue sky. about 3-4pm, i looked up, immediately i saw an oval shape object flew across the sky from south to north with very high speed. the object was really bright, not sure it was glowing or it was the reflection from the sun light. i was skeptical about it, so i told my husband to look up and he saw it too, but he never believe in ufo, so he told me that's a bird. there were sea gulls flying above too, but the oval object definitely higher than those sea gulls. i have good vision, not wearing glasses. the object was in chrome color, it was very bright, but i couldn't tell it was glowing or it's just the reflection from the sun light. the object was in very high altitude and the speed 2-3 times faster than a commercial plane. no sound. my feeling at that time, it looked like a satellite orbiting the earth in terms of the high speed and moving in straight line, except i'm not sure there's a satellite orbiting the earth in such low altitude that can be seen in daytime and in oval shape.
content.summary: Oval shape object flew over

content.detailedDescription: Was driving home on a back country road in boulder country around 10:30 pm.  saw a bunch of lights (approx 20+) coming from the ground up to the sky and at first i though it was a tower with lights, but i had never seen it there before and the lights were moving and glowing.  it looked like a bunch of huge fire flies in a group, floating up from the ground. on the ground below it looked like a large fire at first but it was just alot of light shining up from the ground in a area.  i tried to take a picture with my cell phone as i drove away, afraid to stay alone.  i ran home to get my 15 year old son and came back about 25 minutes later.  there were only two lights flying around in the sky when we got back and as we stopped to watch, one seemed to change direction and slowly come towards us, so we left.  i have a picture on my cell phone of just a few of the lights i saw as i was driving away.
content.summary: 20 + star like objects ascending from an area of light on the ground in boulder, co

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
this video was shot using a cell phone.  the orange light is a street light.  the white light is the one that we are talking about.  the guy said it is a meteor.  however the flight path started out to our right, then it made a 90 degree right turn and started to head away from us.    also you will notice a few flashes of green light above the white light.   this green light flash was not visible to our naked eyes. 
 
 
please let me know what you find out with this video.   


video properties and location. 
 
location: harrodsburg, kentucky
video created 2011/ oct, 16. around 11:23,  
resolution 720x480
content.summary: Unknown light flying, then a green pulsating light not visiable to the naked eye.

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my back yard burning off garden material and sat back to enjoy the warmth and looked up to notice a bird flying over (east direction) head and as i looked at it i noticed much higher up 1 x silver star like object that was stationary.  i thought it was odd that a star would be visible in day light so continued to observe it and to my surprise it started to move rapidly toward the south west. 

i continued to watch it not understanding what it was.  an airliner jet flew over from the south east corner into a north west direction toward the airport.  this thing was many times higher than the jet.  

after it traveled a little i noticed a second orb appear out of no where - again heading in a similar direction.  the 1st orb was still visible when at 30 degree angle from me (rather then directly overhead being 90 degrees).  

it had to have been huge given the altitude.  the 1st object traveled much faster then the 2nd but they both disappeared out of sight in the south west direction at an angle of about 20 degrees.

i have no idea what they were. my logical mind rules out stars because they don't move, and satellites because they don't hover.  i can rule out a bird because it was a light much like a star but just before 4pm in the afternoon.

i am stumped and will keep my eyes open to try take photo next time!
content.summary: 2 silver orbs fly over eastern suburbs of melbourne

content.detailedDescription: At around 2:30am i went outside for a cigarette, walked down to the end of my walkway and i turned around. when i did there they were,two very bright  orange lights hovering in the distance as i looked out over my house. they started to brighten even more and i thought they were coming closer but then dimmed and brighten again in sequence. they did this several times and then faded after about 7_10 minutes and we're gone. i kept looking when i saw one light back up and continued to do the same as before brightening and dimming. and then vanished again not to return. at first i started to become very nervous, as i thought they were getting closer but then i calmed down and was just in total awe as i noticed they were strobing irregularly in sequence with each other. i noticed that the object to the left was drifting closer to the other, i was hoping for a merger, this dint happen. they would brighten to the size of a baseball and then shrink to a size of a small star. i so wanted to get my camera but was afraid that i would miss them. after they disappear i went inside and told my wife what had happened and we both went outside this time i carried my camera but they did not return. my wife noticed that the birds in the area were very active for this time in the morning. a police. officer was passing game by and stopped, i told her i saw two lights in the sky, she thought i was drinking and drove off. i did have a wine cooler around 1:45am but that was it. i have seen a few very strange. objects in the sky my whole life but this was the first time that i was totally freaked out about it. i don't think i will ever go outside with out a camera of some type again.
content.summary: 2 orange lights that brightened and dimmed in sequence, going from very small to very large and back again. then disappear.  then one came back.

content.detailedDescription: At around 2:30am i went outside for a cigarette, walked down to the end of my walkway and i turned around. when i did there they were,two very bright  orange lights hovering in the distance as i looked out over my house. they started to brighten even more and i thought they were coming closer but then dimmed and brighten again in sequence. they did this several times and then faded after about 7_10 minutes and we're gone. i kept looking when i saw one light back up and continued to do the same as before brightening and dimming. and then vanished again not to return. at first i started to become very nervous, as i thought they were getting closer but then i calmed down and was just in total awe as i noticed they were strobing irregularly in sequence with each other. i noticed that the object to the left was drifting closer to the other, i was hoping for a merger, this dint happen. they would brighten to the size of a baseball and then shrink to a size of a small star. i so wanted to get my camera but was afraid that i would miss them. after they disappear i went inside and told my wife what had happened and we both went outside this time i carried my camera but they did not return. my wife noticed that the birds in the area were very active for this time in the morning. a police. officer was passing game by and stopped, i told her i saw two lights in the sky, she thought i was drinking and drove off. i did have a wine cooler around 1:45am but that was it. i have seen a few very strange. objects in the sky my whole life but this was the first time that i was totally freaked out about it. i don't think i will ever go outside with out a camera of some type again.
content.summary: 2 orange lights that brightened and dimmed in sequence, going from very small to very large and back again. then disappear.  then one came back.

content.detailedDescription: My dad saw three bright red lights that formed a triangle hovering south san jose, ca last night around 8:50-9:00 pm while he was outside locking his truck up for the night. he called my house and told me to run outside and look up in the sky towards his place. i am about 6-7 miles from his place. i couldn't see anything, but he was still watching it while i was on the phone with him. i would say the event lasted 5+ minutes until he lost sight of the lights. i am not sure what he witnessed, but it looks like people in other states witnessed something similar last night.
content.summary: 3 bright red lights in a triangle shape hovering over south san jose last night.

content.detailedDescription: Driving east on los indios on the way home from wallgreens at 183 & mcniel and saw 3 bright red orange lights flying in formation out of the north heading south south east.  immediatley felt they looked out of place & unusually bright, simmilar to mercury vapor street lamp color or looked like mars when its really close.  i pulled the car over and got out to watch and one of the objects flew straight overhead.  there was some low cloud cover tonight so i only got to see through breaks in the clouds as the objects were just above the cloud layer.  it made almost no noise until it was right over me and i heard a faint whooshing noise as if wind rushing over the object.  it appeared to be almost circular but with a slight egg shape with the narrow end towards the front.  when i was watching the one go overhead i could see there were 5 lights to the northn on the horizon where there were only three before.  as they got close to being overhead the orange light seemed to go away and you could only see it when it was right above you, only a slight blue green, very faint glowing of the object was visible, enough to make out the outline.  i only managed to see two of the objects go directly over me.  while i was focusing on the second one that flew directly above me it semmed that the others disappeared.  i have to believe in a city the size of austin on a saturday night i cant be the only one who saw this! i was in the middle of a crowded suburban neighborhood. i have seen "stars" that appear to move in the past on a couple of occasions but this one takes the cake, never before have i seen the actual outline of a craft like these.  im a bit shook i must admit.
content.summary: Saw about 3 red orange lights flying in formation, stopped to look, they flew right over head followed by 5 more,

content.detailedDescription:
Object flew from west to east in straight line with no sound in under 3 min then just vanished. 
my mother and i were in the back yard talking when we noticed a spherical object flying. we tried to identify it, but were unsuccessful. we were amazed that there was no accompanying sound. our first thought was maybe a helicopter, then meteor due to the lack of sound. it was a very bright orange/red color and moved incredibly fast. it didn't appear to get closer to the ground, just vanished. since we live close to the base, we are used to seeing planes and helicopters, and this was neither. mom ran in to get binoculars and it was gone by the time she returned a min. later.
content.summary: Object flew from west to east in straight line with no sound in under 3 min then just vanished

content.detailedDescription:
Coming home down victory memorial parkway heading south. father was driving and said what is that. we pulled over, me and my younger brother jumped out and viewed 3 orange-red lights, hovering very far away. they were in a straight diagonal line, at an equal distance from each other. ~10 seconds out of the car the top light disappeared, ~20sec after that happened the bottom light disappeared and then about 10 secs after the last
(middle) light disappeared. they were all moving east in the sky at the same rate after the small, bottom light had caught up. while viewing we made sure it was not a star, then i squinted to make sure i could not see blinking lights like an airplanes. i just couldn't believe this was finally happening to me.
content.summary: 3 orange objects, equal distance from each other in a straight diagonal line.

content.detailedDescription: Around 9 pm i witnessed a bright glowing object that entered the atmosphere and passed a plane that was flying in almost the exact same direction.  this object was moving at least two times as fast as the plane.  i recognized that the object was not following the curve of the earth.  it traveled in a straight line and continued until it faded and left the atmosphere.  objects that are entering the atmosphere will fall and light up as they burn.  the light was steady like illumination.
content.summary: Object entered in apmosphere and then left

content.detailedDescription: Went outside lit a cigarette, saw light too bright to be a star,and stars were not yet visible, got binoculars, took a look saw the object with a ring spinning around it with a dimmer one to the right, it was in the northwest sky. the motion is erratic with the dimmer light mirroring the same erratic behavior as the bright object. i saw a couple of airplanes flying below the object. i'm still observing the object and for the past hour they are in a very slow path north with spinning and erratic movement
content.summary: Strange bright light with dim light at 3 oclock erratic motion

content.detailedDescription: I was looking at sunset to the west (obviously) at around 7:35 pm et from my home in danielson, connecticut.  noticed a black to dark gray, measurable (longer than a jet liner), rectangular shape object tumbling below cirrus clouds (they were probably 35k - 40k alt from my flying experience) periodically reflecting sunlight (golden flash) as it tumbled lengthwise.  it traveled from ssw to sse in a matter or 40 secs���.  i estimate that it was no more than a mile high, most likely lower, based upon my familiarity with observing jet planes flying overhead from pvd.  i am 65 yrs old, an amateur astronomer, and have never seen anything like this, ever.  if not for the shape and speed, i would think it was a released helium baloon from a child's event. this was not the case.  i estimate that this object was moving at approximately 200- 400 mph.  i am a professional civil engineer and my wife, who also observed this, is a high school teacher.  we are in our mid-60's.  don't hesitate to contact me at (860) 774-1998
content.summary: Oblong shape observed when sitting on private deck at house

content.detailedDescription: Driving on hwy 35 heading north about 4:00 or 5:00.Came around a corner and there it was.We call this area radar mountain.It was on the other side of the hill so all i could see was the top of it.Gold or copper in color.Huge and seen a hatch type door with a 3-4 ladder rungs below it.The out side of the ship was like pieces riveted.To tell the truth i didn`t think it was a ufo.The mining company was building a new building and i assumed that was it.Till the next time i drove that road and it was gone.Sorry i don`t remember the year this happened.I drove this road alot for a few years and have seen lights that followed along side the road.This was like 9:00 pm or so.I worked from 10:00 pm till morning.Again i don`t know the year but i do know the show hall in aurora was having a show of lights that night.Where they had a huge spot light and they were shining it up in the sky.I didn`t think it was the show of lights...I thought helicopter.The only thing...There was no sound.I now carry my camera with me all the time.
content.summary: Huge ufo behind a hill

content.detailedDescription:
I was in a public parking lot in east providence, ri, preparing to enter  pharmacy. i glanced toward the northeastern sky and noticed what seemed to be a star at first. it was four o'clock in the afternoon with a cloudless, sunny sky. i thought it was strange to see a star in these conditions.

as i continued to look at it, i realized that it was getting larger and descending. the whole time, it was flashing very intensely. it came as close to what appeared to be less than a mile away, at an elevation of approximately 500 meters. these are estimates because it was difficult to find adequate references.

however, there was a jet plane in the northern sky at the same time, and it was obviously at a much higher altitude.

this object then followed a path in a south eastern direction, pausing at times and making course corrections that seemed deliberate.

after five minutes, it ascended at what seemed to be a 45 degree angle, at a relatively fast pace and in a direct line due east.

i did have a camera phone with me at the time, but did not capture any images. i believe they wouldn't have come out properly and did not want to lose track of it.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Metallic spherical object pulsates with light, descends, hovers, then ascends after a five minute long path

content.detailedDescription: I was 14 at the time and my mom ran in the house very excited and said, "come see the ufo!" and she ran back out. about 8 neighbors and a few kids were across the street looking east into the sky. there was an enormous brilliant white/yellow perfectly round light that hung stationary in the sky. it was significantly larger than the moon and more brilliant.  there were two other smaller lights of the same brilliance and shape as the huge center one but the other two were moving in a slow circular pattern around the edge of the center one that never moved. the light was much brighter than the moon but did not hurt our eyes to look at it. the edges were very clearly defined and the light was not a reflection but emanated from the objects themselves. the neighbors had been looking at it for about half an hour before my mother was called on the phone to come and see. she then came to get my brother, sister and myself. everyone agreed it was either a ufo or a new technology from the local space aeronautics company where many of the neighbors worked. after about half an hour of watching i got bored and went home to watch tv. after about 20 minutes back in the house, i could hear everyone outside yell, "oh!", and "ah!" and then yell loudly, "oh my god!"  my mom came inside not long after and said i should have stayed. she said they saw a plane fly near the objects and it suddenly got very bright...And that is all i can remember.  my emotional memory tells me she described an event where the thing either blew up or became somehow larger or more brilliant or some other description that was unbelievable or spectacular, but i was too young and it was too long ago to remember all the details of what my mother described. there was no report in the news or the paper the next day or days after that. i would like to know what the others thought about the incident but lost track of all of them after we moved in december of that same year. my mother died and none of us every talked about the event after it happened.  it just had no significance to our lives to ever talk about it. it was so completely unknown that it had no relevance after the event. but it does now, and i sure wish i could talk to anyone who might have also seen it, all the way to the end, which i sadly missed.
content.summary: Huge solid round briliant bright light and two smaller same shape and color that circled the huge center one.

content.detailedDescription:
About 8:15 pm, my wife and i were approaching our house from our back alley.  since i've seen ufo's all of my life, i'm prone to checking the sky.  i noticed toward the south three unblinking red lights, bigger than stars without a doubt.  they were flying in a northerly direction.  i pointed them out to my wife who also saw them.  since we heard someone shooting off fireworks a few blocks to the southwest of us, she figured it was due to that, but then changed as we stood under the stars and watched these lights.  there was a few clouds in the sky.  as they almost got over our house, they seemed to vanish or 'blink out'.  my wife again thought that they were embers from the fireworks, but i told her embers burn out fairly quickly and move with the wind.  these did not and i perceived that they went behind the clouds.  the whole incident lasted about four to five minutes.
     these was not the first red light i've seen over our house.  last july 4th, an unblinking red light flew in a south to north direction over our house and was seen by one of the neighbor pre-teen kids.  but that's another story.
     thank you.
content.summary: Three reddish lights unblinking flying over house.

content.detailedDescription:
It was the night of the perseid meteor shower. my teenage son and i sat on our patio watching the sky. we were surprised by what appeared to be a flock of glowing green lights that shot by us to the west in a south-north direction. i've seen a lot of meteors over the years, but this didn't look like anything i'd ever seen. my son turned and asked, "what was that, dad?" i simply said, "i don't know. never seen anything like that."

my son stood and went inside to get a drink of water. our house was situated directly under the airport landing path, so a couple of large jets flew past on their approach to the runway. at that location, the airplanes were fairly large in the sky. above them was a layer of puffy clouds that extended to where it touched the tops of the wasatch mountains. as i sat watching the sky above me, i noticed movement against the black sky. it was hard to distinguish at first, but as i focused on that part of the sky, i saw a huge black triangular object above the clouds that was moving steadily from north to south directly above the landing pattern. compared to the jet airplanes, the object was massive. it had five chevron-shaped lights, which i imagined must be its engines. they glowed a soft reddish-orange color, and the glow pulsated slightly. there was one at the nose of the object and two more along each side. at the speed the object was moving, i thought there would be a tremendous roar associated with it, but it was completely silent. i watched it move south to where it banked and changed to an eastern course. it crossed the wasatch mountains at a place near mount olympus, and it was still huge in comparison to everything around. judging against the mountain tops, i estimate that it was about a mile long. as the object moved to the south, i could see that it had thickness, but not much.

during the time that i watched it, i was so dumbstruck that i couldn't call for anyone to come and look. it was gone in only a few seconds. i knew that it was bigger than any earthly aircraft, and i've seen the biggest on earth. my first thoughts were, "i've just seen something from outside our world."

i've pondered the sight over and over again for many years. it has changed my view of life. i still hold my religious views, because in my beliefs, we are not alone in the vast universe, but i feel like we're being visited from somewhere else now. i'd desperately like to know if anyone else had the same experience that night. i've told a few people, but they act like i'm nuts when i talk about it.
content.summary: Huge black triangle with five chevron-shaped lights passed overhead then turned east and disappeared over mountains.

content.detailedDescription: I live not far from an airport so thought at first might be an airplane. but airplanes are not round and don't fly that low and make noise. i was sitting on the edge of my bed and glanced out the window and saw this round disc go over very quietly the tops of the trees it was maybe 9 to 11 at night. i looked and looked to determine shape. it was round with lights around the edges and a small red flashing light beneath. it was moving slowly and quietly. it just kept moving i think the direction of illinois. as for feeling i am not scared of any visitors and as this is first time i ever saw something like this was a little surprised after hearing of others seeing this same sort of thing. i have mixed feelings thinking that it could have been made here in this country.
content.summary: Iwas setting on edge of my bed. and glanced over to bedroom window { curtains were open.  and saw this round disc go slowly over the tops of trees it had lights sround the edges and it looked also like a small flashing red light on the bottom. i live not

content.detailedDescription:
Me and my partner went outside after seeing a very bright object in the sky in south liverpool l1 , we have seen this same object on three other occassions , the last two times we have captured the object on camera 
we went out on the 11th of may 2012 , at approx 10.00pm to take photos of this object that was in the sky as we moved closer to get a better picture another object appears in the camera shot but not visible to the naked eye , the last time it appeared we also seen other objects in the camera shot but not with the naked eye and in each picture the objects seem to be moving all over the place p.S the camera does not have a flash and was on 2048 by 1536 resolution 
managed to capture the event and will be looking to see if it returns over the next couple of nights 
having done some internet searches it appears that there have been a number of different things seen in the liverpool skies 
if any one else seen this object on friday night leave a comment please
content.summary: One object hovering other lights visible in camera shot that appeared and dissapeared

content.detailedDescription: Moved very fast, no noise, almost translucent, 3 triangles in a triangular shape, camouflaged with the night sky, and the park lights reflected underneath of the object from the park i was in.
content.summary: 3 triangles in a a triangular shape, flying very fast. almost translucent ..

content.detailedDescription: I was on the roof of the dorm i live in, not drinking, not on drugs, completely sober. i was looking at the stars when i saw a red star which at first i thought was a shooting star, it came from the north then stopped directly above me, move in and out of the big dipper, shot to polaris, then shot to the west. it came back 5 times in similar fashion, just varying the side in which it came from. the ufo appeared immediatley after shooting stars, but had the ability to slow and change directions. the last time i saw it, it appeared as a start sitting still then moved slighlty close to me and did a spiral around the neighboring star and disapeared into space
content.summary: Red star weaving across the sky varying speed and direction
